```{r}
port = 8787:8788
rscl = lapply(port, function(port) RS.connect(port=port))
lapply(rscl, RS.eval, {x <- as.data.table(iris); TRUE})
lapply(rscl, RS.eval, x[, lapply(.SD, mean), Species])
lapply(rscl, RS.close)
```
